General.Name: Junhe Pumps Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Junhe Pumps Holding Co., Ltd. produces and sells household water pumps in China. The company offers submersible, garden jet, Li-battery, deep well, fountain, and pool pumps, as well as accessories. It also exports its products to Europe, North America, South America, the Middle East, Oceania, and internationally. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Ningbo, China.
